channel.title: Typescript on Sam Taylor
channel.description: Recent content in Typescript on Sam Taylor

item.title: Line art
item.description: Built a line drawing tool inspired by linify.me. Made with a “pin spacing” option so that I can do this for real using cotton string and a wooden frame with pins. Bought the materials but need to update the code to output sequences of directions before attempting it. Initially written using a genetic algorithm, it worked but was waaaay too slow, so switched to subtracting the darkest lines between pins from the image.

item.title: Ant foraging simulator
item.description: Wrote an ant foraging/pheromone simulator for a laugh. It doesn’t work very well, probably needs the parameters tweaked a bit. Source
